title: Internet cuts out regularly only when playing league.
body:
Before I start let me answer some questions that I know are bound to come up:

- Yes I am sure it is league causing the problem, I have isolated my pc on the network and closed all other internet-using programs
- It only happens when I am connecting to an AI or norms game.
- This issue doesn't impact any other devices on the network.
- My internet only comes back once I run a troubleshoot

The basic rundown of my issue is that during most of my games my internet goes out. As I have stated up there ^ I know that it is league causing the problems. Sometimes these drops happen during champion select, sometimes they happen later on during my actual game. My internet provider is TPG, I am playing on a HP Pavilion 15 using WiFi. If there is any more information that you need please let me know.

-Lumes (LegitDank was a meme, I regret everything)

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please do the following for me;

* [Switch to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)
* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the direct url to your ICSI netalyzr results.
Lol sorry this took me so long to reply. I'll do all that tomorrow when I have a bit more time. Thanks.
